titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on butanamide, N-(2,3-dihydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl)-2-[2-(2-methoxyphenyl)diazenyl]-3-oxo-.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on butanamide, N-(2,3-dihydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl)-2-[2-(2-methoxyphenyl)diazenyl]-3-oxo-.
